programme.title: Party Favor
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E13, Carrie helps Doug plan a bachelor party after she volunteers him to be the friendless Danny's best man.

programme.title: Block Buster
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E14, Doug's memories of his glory days as a football player don't match those of his old teammates.

programme.title: Frozen Pop
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E15, Arthur disrupts Carrie and Doug's lives by moving from the cold basement to the much warmer second floor.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E16, Doug is distraught when he learns that Carrie has been cheating at board games.

programme.title: Meet By-Product
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E17, Carrie and Doug reminisce about how they first met, remembering that it certainly wasn't love at first sight.

programme.title: The Shmenkmans
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E18, Doug and Carrie search for new friends, who do not have children; Arthur rediscovers a breakfast cereal from his childhood.

programme.title: Surprise Artie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E19, Doug tries to keep Arthur busy while Carrie sets up a surprise party for his 75th birthday.

programme.title: Wild Cards
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E20, Doug loses all his money when he goes to Atlantic City with Deacon; Arthur threatens to injure Carrie's boss.

programme.title: Big Dougie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E21, Big Brother Doug tries anything to impress his new protege, including entering a 10K run.

programme.title: Soft Touch
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E22, Doug is duped by Tim into participating in a pyramid scheme that requires him to sell water filters.

programme.title: Restaurant Row
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E23, Carrie bars Doug from eating at his favorite Italian restaurant, but he goes back for lunch and bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E24, Carrie gets jealous of a co-worker who received flowers and accuses Doug of losing his sense of romance.

programme.title: Whine Country
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E25, A coin toss decides the destination for Doug and Carrie's vacation; Arthur and Spence join Doug and Carrie on vacation.

programme.title: Do Rico
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E01, When Doug does the voice of a new co-worker, he feels that Carrie will only listen to him if he does the voice.

programme.title: Roast Chicken
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E02, When Doug's boss sees what a comedian he is, he asks him to "roast" him at his banquet. However, Doug finds that he is not as funny as he first thought.

programme.title: Fatty McButterpants
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E03, When Doug learns that Carrie is buying him clothing from the "Big and Tall Shop", he is determined to lose weight.

programme.title: Class Struggle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E04, When Carrie spends a night out with some of her colleagues, she finds out that they are more successful then she is.

programme.title: Strike One
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E05, While Doug's company is in strict negotiations, he decides to buy a brand new SUV.

programme.title: Strike Too
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E06, It is week two of the IPS strike, and Doug still has not gotten a job. To get back on his feet, his sister Stephanie get him a substitute teacher job at her school.

programme.title: Strike Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E07, Carrie and Kelly plan a get-together for Doug, Deacon and Arthur to keep them from going crazy during the strike.

programme.title: Dark Meet
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E08, Doug, Carrie and Arthur are thinking about the first Thanksgiving they (and Arthur's second wife Lily) spent together.

programme.title: Twisted Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E09, Doug and Carrie have to watch Deacon and Kelly's kids while they are out of town. When one of the kids sees them having sex, they have to find a way to keep him from saying anything.

programme.title: Work Related
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E10, When Arthur goes to Carrie's work he is offered a job there, which really begins to irritate her. Doug competes to be Mr. May for IPS but Deacon is in the way of him getting it.

programme.title: Better Camera
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E11, Doug buys Carrie a camera for christmas, but her office gives her a better one. Lou Ferigno moves in next door.

programme.title: Wedding Presence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E12, Doug and Carrie try to go to a wedding but not have to stay.

programme.title: Hi-Def Jam
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E13, Doug convinces his sister to go out with Carrie's boss so that he can go to his house to watch the Super Bowl on his high-def TV.

programme.title: Paint Misbehavin'
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E14, Doug makes Carrie tell him people she knows that she finds attractive, and she says Deacon. Deacon is having a birthday party at a paintball course and it turns into a war.

programme.title: Paint Your Office
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E06, Norm agrees to paint Rebecca's office in return for running up his tab.

programme.title: The Last Angry Mailman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E07, Cliff tries to save his childhood home from getting bulldozed.

programme.title: Bidding On The Boys
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E08, Lilith gets back at Frasier for wanting her to sign a pre-nuptial agreement.

programme.title: Pudd'nhead Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E09, Woody finds a new admirer when he portrays Mark Twain as an understudy.

programme.title: A Kiss Is Still A Kiss
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E10, Sam encourages Rebecca to tell her boss she has a crush on him.

programme.title: My Fair Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E11, Cliff gives his girl a makeover and ends up losing her to every other guy.

programme.title: Christmas Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E12, Sam buys a last minute Christmas gift for Rebecca from another shopper.

programme.title: Woody For Hire Meets Norman Of The Apes
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E13, Robert Urich visits Cheers when Woody makes his television debut.

programme.title: And God Created Woodman
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E14, Sam and Woody take the rap for Rebecca when she breaks a priceless vase.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Cuties
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E15, Carla gives birth to twins, a boy and girl. During Carla's absence, the bar hires two waitresses.

programme.title: Yacht Of Fools
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E16, Mr. Drake invites Sam and Rebecca for a weekend on his yacht. Rebecca still pines for Mr. Drake.

programme.title: To All The Girls I've Loved Before
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E17, Frasier second-guesses his wedding when the guys throw him a bachelor party.

programme.title: Let Sleeping Drakes Lie
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E18, Rebecca gets caught snooping in Evan's room when he returns from Europe early.

programme.title: Airport V
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E19, Eddie becomes an ice skater in a penguin suit for ice shows, and invites Carla to see the show in Seattle.

programme.title: The Sam In The Grey Flannel Suit
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E20, Rebecca learns Sam was promoted solely to help the softball team win.

programme.title: Our Hourly Bread
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E21, Woody and Sam want a raise, but the bar's takings have been declining for three months.

programme.title: Slumber Party Massacred
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E22, Carla's depressed when she learns she's going to be a grandmother.

programme.title: Bar Wars
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E23, Sam and his Cheers gang have lost 173 sporting competitions to their rival, Gary and Gary's Old Town Tavern.

programme.title: The Big Kiss-Off
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E24, Sam and Woody make a bet that they can kiss Rebecca before midnight.

programme.title: Back Seat Becky, Up Front
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E25, Rebecca finds out Evan is moving to Tokyo and bringing another woman along.

programme.title: How To Recede In Business
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E01, Lillian Corporation's new vice president fires Rebecca and rehires Sam as the bar's revival manager.

programme.title: Swear to God
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E02, Sam vows to be abstinent when he finds out he may have fathered a child.

programme.title: Executive Sweet
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E03, Sam traps Rebecca into declaring that she's in love with her boss.

programme.title: One Happy Chappy In A Snappy Serape
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E04, Rebecca pretends she's engaged to Sam when the bar owner proposes.

programme.title: Those Lips, Those Ice
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E05, Carla becomes jealous when she thinks Eddie is having an affair with a skater.

programme.title: Norm, Is That You
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E06, Norm discovers his hidden talent as a talented interior designer.

programme.title: How To Win Friends And Electrocute People
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E07, Cliff has appendicitis, but the gang are more interested in Frasier and Lilith's planned countrywide trip.

programme.title: Jumping Jerks
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E08, After watching The Magnificent Seven, Woody, Cliff, and Norm decide to seek thrills.

programme.title: Send In The Crane
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E09, Sam reunites with his lost love and ends up falling for her daughter!

programme.title: Bar Wars II: The Woodman Strikes Back
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E10, Sam and the Cheers gang lie, cheat and steal to win a drink-making contest.

programme.title: Adventures In Housesitting
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E11, Rebecca panics when her boss's dog runs away while in her care.

programme.title: Please, Mr. Postman
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E12, Cliff and his new co-worker fall for each other and put their jobs at risk.

programme.title: Golden Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S07E13, Woody falls for the beautiful daughter of a wealthy Cheers executive.
Neil Armstrong: One Small Step, 20150720000000 +0000, Neil Armstrong has stamped his place in history by becoming the first person to walk on the moon.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1, S01E01, Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 2, S01E02, In this episode, hear first hand testimonials and dialogue from the incredible men who walked on the moon. Incredible footage and photos give a unique and beautiful experience of their data collection process and journey home.

programme.title: What Is Space?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: What Is Space?, S01E01, Brian Greene reveals space as a dynamic fabric that can stretch, twist, warp, and ripple under the influence of gravity, and explores dark energy, which makes up 70% of the universe.

programme.title: The Illusion of Time
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: The Illusion of Time, S01E02, Brian Greene takes us on the ultimate time traveling adventure, hurtling 50 years into the future before stepping into a wormhole to travel back to Big Bang.

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Quantum Leap, S01E03, Join Brian Greene on a wild ride into the weird realm of quantum physics, which governs the universe on the tiniest of scales.

programme.title: Universe or Multiverse?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Universe or Multiverse?, S01E04, Cutting-edge theories are suggesting that our universe may not be the only universe. Instead, it may be just one of an infinite number of worlds that make up the multiverse.

programme.title: Invasion on Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Invasion on Mars, S03E04, The EXO Mars and Curiosity continue their scientific discoveries as we prepare new missions both robotic and manned to the Red planet Mars.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: Orbit
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Orbit, S02E03, The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R
MOON SHINE, S05E02, The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: The Dark Side
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Dark Side, S02E10, Perhaps that American politician was right. There are indeed things we know we don’t know.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: Getting There
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Getting There, S02E02, Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial 'swords into ploughshares'.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: Foul Plié
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E39, A ballet dancer is bludgeoned to death with her own point shoes, and investigators find a bookish body double waiting in the wings.

programme.title: Iron Murphy

programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E27, A Texas father takes his spoiled teenage daughter to an exclusive Caribbean resort and somehow ends up packed in his own suitcase.

programme.title: Car Crimes In Cleveland
programme.desc: Crime Stoppers: Case Files, S02E07, Cleveland. April 14, 2007, 37-year-old Gregory Fitz and three friends were returning from a night out when two males attempted to rob them. March 18, 2006, 25-year-old Jaylin Smith and friend were victims, instantly killing Jaylin.

programme.title: Tragic Case
programme.desc: Crime Stoppers: Case Files, S02E14, Miami. July 5, 2009, 29-year-old Rodger Davis was killed by multiple gunshot wounds in his vehicle. October 26, 2010, 22-year-old Shane Beacham was shot when meeting an acquaintance. December 4, 2009, Carol Taylor was stopped by a vehicle and murdered.

programme.title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
programme.desc: Targeted For Murder, S01E24, When a mega rich Texas oil heir is found murdered in the mansion he shares with his former beauty queen girlfriend, police discover that she has mysteriously gone missing.

programme.title: Monday Night Murder
programme.desc: Targeted For Murder, S01E03, When a man's family and coworkers lose touch with him for days, the police are sent to his apartment. But what they find is far worse than any of them expected.

programme.desc: 24 Hours in Police Custody, S01E08, Alcohol and relationship tensions combine to make dangerous cocktails.

programme.title: Mapping a Murder
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S03E302, Mapping a Murder follows the groundbreaking investigation into the murder of Dr. Teresa Sievers, which pioneered a forensic technique that mapped the killing and solved the case.

programme.title: Greens Prairie Murder
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S03E307, Greens Prairie Murder tells the story of Virginia Freeman, the exhaustive investigation into her murder and how, after nearly four decades, police were finally able to solve the case.

programme.title: Hitchhike Horror
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S03E312, Hitchhike Horror is the story of Jeannie Moore, the almost 40 year investigation into her murder and how it became the first case in Colorado to be solved with a revolutionary forensics technique.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Death of a Hero
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E04, A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo. A closer look at the crime scene reveals Bennie was dead before the fire, bumping an arson case up to homicide.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E19, Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: A Family Cursed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E09, One family faces two unsolved murders of their loved ones. It takes thirteen years for detectives to uncover the one missing clue that can lead them to the killer: the hidden crime scene.

programme.title: Murder In the Midwest
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E03, The body of Lori Nesson is found in a ditch in 1974, yet her death is not ruled a homicide. After four decades, the cause of death is changed to homicide, and the search begins for a killer.

programme.title: The Brute Man
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Brute Man, S07E02, Rondo Hatton plays a disfigured man, a/k/a “The Creeper,” who hunts down and kills the people responsible for his deformity.

programme.title: The Castle of FuManchu
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Castle of FuManchu, S03E23, The Castle of FuManchu tries to conquer the world by turning all water into ice.

programme.title: The Corpse Vanishes
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Corpse Vanishes, S01E05, In the theater, Joel and the Bots get the third installment of "Radar Men from the Moon" before the Bela Lugosi film "The Corpse Vanishes".

programme.title: The Crawling Eye
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Crawling Eye, S01E01, Things start to look eerily familiar to scientists Crevett and Brooks when mountain climbers begin losing their heads in the Trollenberg Mountains.

programme.title: The Human Duplicators
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Human Duplicators, S05E20, An alien takes over a professor's mansion-basement laboratory, and makes android clones to infiltrate the government.

programme.title: The Incredibly Strange Creature
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Incredibly Strange Creature, S08E19, A couple of slackers stumble across a cult of monsters at a carnival and becomes a killing zombie.
The Santa Suit, 20251209130338 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Drake Hunter has a plan to boost sales for his father's toy company.
The Town Christmas Forgot, 20251209144726 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. An upscale, urban family gets stranded in a remote lumber town before Christmas.
The Wishing Tree, 20251209163313 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A professor supervises orphan students who have nowhere to go for the holidays.
One Christmas Eve, 20251209181830 +0000, Hallmark Hall of Fame. A divorced mom wants her two kids' first Christmas without dad to be perfect.
Road to Christmas, 20251209200330 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. TV Producer Maggie brings her boss' three sons home for the holidays.
Sound of Christmas, 20251209214734 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A music teacher is hired by a widower to give lessons to his daughters.
The National Tree, 20251210095007 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A man and his son embark on a road trip to transport a Christmas tree.

programme.title: Conversion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E08, After being injected with Beckett's Wraith treatment, Sheppard's life is in danger as he slowly is transforming into an Iratus bug hybrid. The team rushes to find a cure and reverse the side effects, but in the end it might be up to Sheppard.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E09, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E10, The team are kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E03, The Destiny is on a collision course with an ancient ship found floating in space. Panic turns to wonder as the ships dock with each other. The crew discovers that it might hold the key to a connection back to Earth and other hidden secrets.

programme.title: Pathogen
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E04, On Destiny, Chloe's behavior has become a cause of concern and a worried Scott makes a shocking discovery while searching her quarters: a journal with Alien script. He shows it to Young and Rush who decide they must keep a constant eye on Chloe.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E09, After relocating an endangered civilization to a safe new planet, the team realizes that another race of aliens is planning to incinerate the planet's surface to make it inhabitable. Will SG-1 be able to reason with the marauding aliens?

programme.title: Beneath The Surface
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E10, With memories erased and identities changed, SG-1 find themselves trapped below a domed city on a planet of ice, toiling as slave laborers. Can they come to their senses and make a break for the surface, or will they remain enslaved underground?

programme.title: Point Of No Return
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E11, When a quirky conspiracy theorist contacts SG-1 claiming to know classified information about the Stargate, at first they think he's bluffing. But when they investigate his wild claims, they realize he's a lot closer to the truth than they thought.

programme.title: Grace Under Pressure
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E14, While testing a newly repaired puddle jumper, McKay and Captain Hugh Griffin suddenly lose control of the ship and crash into the ocean. As the jumper begins to sink slowly towards the bottom of the ocean, Griffin sacrifices himself to save McKay.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E15, Sheppard and the team discover a world that has technology created by the Ancients. But the planet's royal family does not allow anyone but them to harness the technology and treat the villagers with little dignity.

programme.title: Conversion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E08, After being injected with Beckett's Wraith treatment, Sheppard's life is in danger as he slowly is transforming into an Iratus bug hybrid. The team rushes to find a cure and reverse the side effects, but in the end it might be up to Sheppard.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E09, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E10, The team are kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: The Hive
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E11, The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Epiphany
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E12, The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.

programme.title: Critical Mass
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E13, The team races to foil the Goa'uld's plans to destroy Atlantis after Maj. Gen. Landry informs them that a bomb has been planted, triggered to detonate the next time the team heads to Earth. Meanwhile, two Wraith ships are heading towards Atlantis.

programme.title: Awakenings
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E03, The Destiny is on a collision course with an ancient ship found floating in space. Panic turns to wonder as the ships dock with each other. The crew discovers that it might hold the key to a connection back to Earth and other hidden secrets.

programme.title: Mr. Walsh Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S04E031, Brandon goes to Washington D.C. and Kelly decides to surprise him by showing up later. Donna worries about David spending time with another girl.

programme.title: What I Did On My Summer Vacation and Other Stories
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E001, After enjoying a successful summer in London, Brenda decides to stay in England and pursue her stage career.

programme.title: Under the Influence
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E002, Brandon and Kelly continue to hide their relationship from Dylan, but the truth is always bound to come out somehow.

programme.title: A Clean Slate
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E003, Brandon's decision to run for student government proves to be fatal for one California University sophomore.

programme.title: Life After Death
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E004, Brandon wins the election, but Josh's death hangs heavy on him. Alex tells Brandon he's contesting the election, using Josh's death as leverage to unseat Brandon.

programme.title: Rave On
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E005, Where there's smoke, there's fire, in Kelly's opinion... at least where Valerie is concerned.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E006, The President of Selanesia visits California University to receive cancer treatment.

programme.title: Who's Zoomin' Who?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E007, When the fire marshal shuts down the After Dark for violating capacity, Steve suggests purchasing the space next door.

programme.title: Things That Go Bang In The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E008, Dylan's desperation becomes obvious to all when he takes out his gun and shoots up his living room.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E009, Dylan's closest friends stage an intervention at Casa Walsh, where they beg him to enter rehab.

programme.title: The Dreams of Dylan McKay
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E010, As Dylan lies in a coma fighting for his life, he experiences a number of bizarre dreams involving Erica, his drug dealer, and his dead father.

programme.title: Hate is Just A Four-Letter Word
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E011, The campus erupts in controversy when an accused anti-Semite is asked to give a speaking engagement at the school.

programme.title: Up In Flames
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E013, Emily Valentine returns to Beverly Hills hoping to reunite with Brandon, and even his devotion to Kelly can't dampen the sparks that still burn between them.

programme.title: Injustice For All
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E014, The courts decide on a punishment for Steve, whose illegal rave resulted in the fire that almost took two lives.

programme.title: Christmas Comes This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E015, After reading Erica's plea for help, Dylan leaps into action and hires a private investigator to help him track down her kidnappers.

programme.title: Sentenced To Life
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S05E016, While working off his community service Steve meets a victim of Alzheimer's Disease, whose life story inspires Steve to make the most of his own.

Christmas on Wheels, 20251209130000 +0000, Upon learning that her uncle sold her Mom's vintage convertible -- a car full of Christmas memories -- Ashley enlists the help of her uncle's attorney, Duncan, to get it back.
Christmas Town, 20251209144900 +0000, Get into the holiday spirit with your favorite Lifetime Holiday Movies. It’s the channel that keeps on giving.

Christmas With a Crown, 20251209163100 +0000, When a successful woman returns to her hometown to revive her family's Christmas festival, she meets a dashing stranger who's on a quest to find the holidays' true spirit.

programme.title: Who Had the Best Christmas Cookie Recipe?
programme.desc: Ancient Recipes With Sohla, 20251209182000 +0000, Gingerbread men connect Abe Lincoln and Queen Elizabeth I; Sohla explores two distinct but delicious recipes for classic spiced cookies.
Dear Christmas, 20251209184300 +0000, A podcast host develops an unexpected romance with a local firefighter during the holidays.

programme.title: King Henry VIII's Lavish Brunch
programme.desc: Ancient Recipes With Sohla, 20251209203100 +0000, Sohla makes a meal fit for a king, King Henry VIII to be exact; a lavish brunch including all the works.

Christmas on Wheels, 20251209210000 +0000, Upon learning that her uncle sold her Mom's vintage convertible -- a car full of Christmas memories -- Ashley enlists the help of her uncle's attorney, Duncan, to get it back.
Miracle on 34th Street, 19941115000000 +0000, 6-year-old Susan meets Kriss Kringle, a department store Santa who thinks he's the genuine article.
A Christmas Carol, 19841217000000 +0000, Ebenezer Scrooge, a bitter and lonely old man, learns to open his heart to the spirit of Christmas.

A Christmas Blessing, 20241101000000 +0000, TV star Mandy Gilmore plans to travel after ending her hit culinary show. But a stop in Milwaukee to sell her late aunt's food pantry changes everything. Inspired by volunteer Otto, Mandy decides to host one final holiday feast.
